job_description:
Technical Recruiter

Company Name: Global Surf IT Pvt Ltd Location: Tranasia Cyberpark, Infopark Phase II, Kakkanad

Experience Required:

  • Minimum 2 years in recruitment, with exposure to hiring in technical and creative domains.

Preferred Experience:

  • UAE market knowledge

Job Responsibilities:

  1. End-to-End Recruitment:
    • Manage the full-cycle recruitment process for roles such as Content Writers, Digital Marketing Executives, Software Developers (Front-end, Back-end, or Full Stack).
    • Define job descriptions, prepare interview questions, and ensure timely feedback to candidates.
  2. Candidate Sourcing:
    • Leverage job boards, LinkedIn, social media, and employee referrals to identify top talent.
    • Build a diverse and qualified talent pipeline for immediate and future hiring needs.
  3. Screening & Selection:
    • Conduct initial screenings to evaluate technical skills, experience, and cultural fit.
    • Coordinate and schedule interviews with hiring managers, ensuring smooth communication.
  4. Collaboration with Stakeholders:
    • Partner with hiring managers to understand specific role requirements and hiring priorities.
    • Provide insights and guidance on market trends and competitive compensation packages.
  5. Compliance & Reporting:
    • Maintain accurate records in Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
    • Prepare weekly and monthly recruitment reports to track progress and performance metrics.
  6. Market Research:
    • Stay informed about UAE labor market trends, including visa processes and employment laws.
    • Continuously improve recruitment strategies to attract top talent in a competitive market.

Qualifications:

  1. Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
  2. Experience: At least 2 years of experience as a recruiter with a focus on hiring for technical and creative roles.
  3. Preferred Experience: Previous recruitment experience in the UAE or Middle East is strongly preferred.

Technical Skills:

  1. Proficiency in Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and recruitment tools such as LinkedIn Recruiter.
  2. Familiarity with sourcing techniques for both creative and technical profiles.

Soft Skills:

  1. Exceptional communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
  2. Ability to multitask, prioritize, and meet tight deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
  • Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
  • Exposure to hiring for diverse industries and markets.
  • Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

Note: Female candidates are preferred.

Contact Information:

Interested? Send your updated CV to talenthunt@gloablsurf.ae with the subject line "Application for IT Recruiter –Global Surf". If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at talenthunt@globalsurf.ae.
summary: Technical Recruiter to manage full-cycle hiring for tech and creative roles. Requires 2+ years experience, ATS proficiency, and strong sourcing skills.

job_description:
Software Test Engineer (Immediate Joining)

About Us Kvaliteta Systems and Solutions, based in Technopark, Trivandrum, is a global IT solutions provider offering a wide range of services, including Digital Transformation, Private Cloud, Infrastructure, Security, and Software Development as a Service. We enable businesses to thrive in the digital era by providing cutting-edge technology solutions.

We are seeking an experienced Software Test Engineer who can assist and empower their development team to deliver with your expertise in creating comprehensive test cases and ensuring the functionality, performance, and security of our platform. The role will focus on testing for different user personas, Java/j2EE, React and Node.js applications, API access, and system integrations.

Experience: 3+ Years Location: Technopark, Trivandrum

Job Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, maintain and execute manual and automated test cases.
  • Test Case Development: Create detailed unit tests and other test cases tailored to different user personas who log into the platform, ensuring that each role and group functions as expected, ensuring front-end and back-end components operate correctly and cohesively.
  • API Access Testing: Test API access and interactions based on permissions and roles, ensuring that security and data access control are properly enforced across different user profiles.
  • Performance Testing: Conduct performance testing, focusing on page load times and overall platform responsiveness, identifying areas where optimization is required.
  • Integration Testing: Test the integration of external systems such as API servers, and SSO (Single Sign-On) integrations, ensuring data flows smoothly between systems and functions as expected.
  • Permissions and Role-Based Testing: Validate role-based access and permissions for various user personas, ensuring that different user roles have the appropriate level of access to features and data.
  • Regression Testing: Perform regular regression testing to ensure that new features or bug fixes do not negatively affect the existing functionality of the platform.
  • Security Testing: Ensure that security protocols, including authentication and authorization mechanisms, work properly and safeguard the system from vulnerabilities.
  • Collaboration: Work closely with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders to understand requirements and provide detailed feedback on potential issues by Identifying and documenting the defects, track issues, and collaborate with the development team for resolution.
  • Design and implement automated tests for web and mobile applications and maintaining automated testing frameworks to streamline the testing process, especially for repetitive and critical functionality.
  • Work with the development team to enhance automation and manual testing processes.
  • Ensure high-quality standards through best testing practices.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field
  • 3+ years of experience in both manual and automation testing.
  • Strong expertise in Selenium, Java, and RESTful API testing.
  • Proficiency in manual testing methodologies and test case design.
  • Experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins or GitLab.
  • Experience with performance testing tools and Techniques
  • Experience with bug tracking and test management tools
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

Contact Information: Kvaliteta Systems and Solutions (P) Ltd SBC 2207, 2nd floor, Yamuna Tower Technopark Phase 3 campus Trivandrum-695583 Website: http://www.kvaliteta.in Contact Email: hr@kvaliteta.in

How to Apply Interested candidates are invited to send their resumes to hr@kvaliteta.in with the job title as the subject. Please include your current CTC, relevant experience, and notice period in the email.
summary: Seeking an experienced Software Test Engineer with 3+ years of experience. Responsibilities include designing, executing, and automating test cases for various applications and integrations. Requires expertise in Selenium, Java, and API testing.

job_description:
Accounts Payable - Team Lead

Company: Fakeeh Technologies (P) Ltd

Location: Trivandrum

Department: BPO Finance & Accounts

Reports to: Manager Operations

Work Mode: Work from Home

Experience: 4-6 Years

Closing Date: 31st October 2025

Job Published: 05th October 2025

Contact Email: careers@fakeeh.tech

Key Responsibilities:

  • Supervise and guide the Accounts Payable team in day-to-day operations within Oracle ERP.
  • Allocate tasks, monitor team performance, and ensure timely completion of AP processes.
  • Review and approve invoices, payment batches, and journal entries in Oracle ERP.
  • Provide training and support to team members on Oracle functionalities and AP best practices.
  • Oversee the invoice processing cycle – including PO, GRN, and invoice matching.
  • Ensure accurate vendor master data and adherence to company policies.
  • Manage vendor payments, ensuring timely disbursements and compliance with payment terms.
  • Handle escalations and resolve complex vendor queries or disputes.
  • Review and approve vendor reconciliations, debit/credit notes, and AP aging reports.
  • Identify opportunities to streamline the AP process through automation and Oracle ERP enhancements.
  • Drive initiatives for process standardization and efficiency improvements.
  • Collaborate with procurement and supply chain teams to resolve process bottlenecks and improve workflows.

Preferred Skills & Competencies:

  • Strong working knowledge of Oracle ERP (Accounts Payable module).
  • Excellent understanding of accounting principles and AP lifecycle.
  • Proven leadership and team management skills.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  • Proficiency in MS Excel and financial reporting tools.
  • Ability to work in a high-volume, deadline-driven environment.

Education Qualification:

  • Bachelor or master’s degree in commerce.

Company Address:

Fakeeh Technologies (P) Ltd Carnival Building, 13th Floor, Technopark Campus, Karyavattom, Trivandrum, 695581
summary: Lead the Accounts Payable team, overseeing daily operations, invoice processing, and vendor payments within Oracle ERP. Requires strong accounting knowledge and team management skills.

job_description:
HR Recruiter

Company: GENROBOTIC INNOVATIONS (P) Ltd Location: Thejaswini Building, Technopark, Trivandrum, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.genrobotics.org

Closing Date: 10 October 2025 Job Published: 04 October 2025 Contact Email: career@genrobotics.org

Brief Description

We are seeking a dedicated and dynamic HR Recruiter to join our Human Resources team. The ideal candidate will specialize in recruitment processes and be responsible for understanding and executing staffing requisitions, requirements, and issues from all departments. They will manage end-to-end recruitment activities, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and selecting candidates. Additionally, they will handle job postings, maintain the skill matrix, issue employment documents, and ensure a smooth recruitment process. The candidate should possess strong communication skills, a proactive attitude, and the ability to assist the Recruitment Head with various HR tasks.

Key Responsibilities:

  • End-to-End Recruitment: Handle full-cycle recruitment processes, including sourcing, screening, interviewing, and selecting candidates.
  • Specialized Hiring: Recruit for IT and Non-IT roles, with a focus on Business Development and Sales positions.
  • Employment Documentation: Draft the offer Letter/Employment to selected candidates.
  • Recruitment Campaigns: Plan and execute recruitment campaigns, including attending job fairs, campus recruitment, and other recruitment events.
  • Support to Recruitment Head: Assist the Recruitment Head with various HR tasks and initiatives.

Skills and Qualifications:

  • Qualification: MBA Graduate or equivalent experience in the HR field.
  • Experience: 1-3 years of experience in HR recruitment, preferably with recruitment consultancy experience.
  • Recruitment Expertise: Proven experience in Non-IT recruitment, especially in Business Development/Sales hiring.
  • Technical Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite.
  • Language Skills: Fluency in English and proficiency in Hindi are added advantages.
  • Personal Attributes: Smart, positive, and proactive attitude toward work. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Professionalism: Maintain discretion, confidentiality, and professionalism at all times.

Job Location: Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram

Click here to Apply
summary: Seeking an HR Recruiter with 1-3 years of experience to manage end-to-end recruitment, specializing in IT, Non-IT, Business Development, and Sales roles. Must be proficient in MS Office and possess a proactive attitude.

job_description:
UI/UX Designer (3–5 Years Experience)

Company: TILTLABS CONSULTANCY SERVICES (P) Ltd Location: Technopark, Trivandrum, Kerala, India Contact Email: careers@tiltlabs.io Closing Date: October 31, 2025

Job Summary:

We are seeking a talented and experienced UI/UX Designer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will combine creativity with technical expertise to craft engaging, user-friendly digital experiences across web and mobile platforms. This role requires strong proficiency in design tools, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to translate complex requirements into intuitive interfaces.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Create wireframes, interactive prototypes, and storyboards to visualize and iterate on design concepts.
  • Design user interfaces for web, mobile, and enterprise applications that are visually appealing and intuitive.
  • Collaborate with clients, product managers, and developers to understand requirements and deliver design solutions aligned with business goals.
  • Maintain consistent brand identity across digital platforms and marketing materials.
  • Produce high-quality graphics, icons, illustrations, and minimal 2D animations to enhance user experience.
  • Conduct user research, usability testing, and incorporate feedback into design improvements.
  • Stay updated with emerging design trends, tools, and techniques to innovate and improve design processes.
  • Ensure seamless handoff of design specifications to development teams for accurate implementation.
  • Develop design systems and component libraries to standardize UI across projects.
  • Utilize Generative AI tools (e.g., MidJourney, Adobe Firefly) to create innovative visual solutions and prompt-based illustrations.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Animation, VFX, Graphic Design, Interaction Design, or related field.
  • 3–5 years of professional experience in UI/UX design for web and mobile applications.
  • Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator, and After Effects.
  • Strong portfolio demonstrating wireframing, prototyping, UI design, branding, and illustration skills.
  • Knowledge of responsive design principles and best practices for multiple platforms.
  • Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams including developers, marketers, and stakeholders.
  • Understanding of user-centered design principles and usability testing methodologies.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
  • Strong communication, presentation, and problem-solving skills.
  • Attention to detail with a passion for delivering visually compelling and functional designs.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience in minimal 2D animations and motion graphics.
  • Familiarity with Generative AI platforms for creative design.
  • Knowledge of branding, marketing collateral design, and illustration.
  • Exposure to front-end development basics (HTML, CSS) for effective design handoff.
  • Ability to conceptualize and innovate design solutions for complex user experiences.

Company Address: GH, Ground Floor, Carnival Technopark Building, Technopark, Trivandrum, Kerala, India , 695581

Website: http://www.tiltlabs.io
summary: Seeking a UI/UX Designer with 3-5 years of experience to create user-friendly digital experiences. Must be proficient in design tools and collaborate effectively.
